description:
Yami falls ill with fever, and Rito rushes her to the hospital. When she recovers, Yami questions why Rito would help her since he is her target. Kyouko and Ren eat lunch together where they end up bonding and proving useful to each other. When Lala and Rito meet with Haruna, they notice something is wrong. Haruna is not acting like herself—and, as it turns out, she’s not!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La consultation d’Ombre / Amies plus que rivales / Haruna est bizarre
Yami no Shinryousho / Tekitaishin / Okashina Haruna-chan
Yami`s Clinic / Hostility / A Weird Haruna
闇の診療所 / 敵対心 / おかしな春菜ちゃん
